video.title: The Good Guys
video.synopsis: Old-school cop Dan Stark and squeaky-clean lawman Jack Bailey make oddly matched yet effective partners in this sardonic police action series.

episodes.synopsis: Old-school cop Dan and modern-day detective Jack conduct a routine investigation, but are inadvertently thrust into a much larger case.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a vandalism case, Jack and Dan discover a pattern of stolen vintage cars around the city.
episodes.title: Bait & Switch

episodes.synopsis: When Jack and Dan are assigned to investigate a damaged vending machine at an upscale hotel, the case leads them to a prostitution ring.
episodes.title: Broken Door Theory

episodes.synopsis: A string of dog poisonings in the suburbs puts Jack and Dan on the trail of a well-meaning but oblivious vigilante who plans to sabotage meth labs.
episodes.title: The Dim Knight

episodes.synopsis: When Dan's interrogation methods are deemed unlawful, a drug smuggler is freed. Dan vows to bust the operation using only the money in his pocket.
episodes.title: Three Dollars and Fifty-Two Cents

episodes.synopsis: In order to avoid another boring day at the office, Dan spices up a routine auto theft case by secretly planting evidence from an unrelated file.
episodes.title: Small Rooms

episodes.synopsis: Rumors of an upcoming bank heist have the entire police department on high alert, but Jack and Dan think that the robbery is just a decoy.
episodes.title: Hunches and Heists

episodes.synopsis: To bust some mobsters who slipped through his fingers, Dan goes undercover. But his sting unwittingly inspires two entirely new criminal outfits.
episodes.title: Silvio's Way

episodes.synopsis: When Dan accidentally exposes a participant in the Witness Protection Program, a dangerous crime family sends a hit man after the witness.
episodes.title: Don't Tase Me, Bro

episodes.synopsis: Dan "borrows" money from the Narcotics Division to set up a sting operation. However, the unauthorized work inadvertently finances a prison break.
episodes.title: Vacation

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Dan are assigned to assist a forensic specialist on a burglary investigation. Meanwhile, Liz winds up in danger during a prostitution sting.
episodes.title: Common Enemies

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Dan get a tip about a lowlife stealing mail. During the investigation, they come across forged documents for two murderous drug-runners.
episodes.title: Little Things

episodes.synopsis: After the ex-governor's son is kidnapped, Dan is framed for the crime and forced into hiding. With Dan on the lam, Jack must find the real kidnappers.
episodes.title: Dan on the Run

episodes.synopsis: When a house burns down in an all-but-abandoned neighborhood, Jack's con-man uncle claims to have knowledge about the arsonists behind the crime.
episodes.title: Old Dogs

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Dan investigate an inspection report at a corrupt oil company, only to learn that they might have stumbled onto a deadly criminal conspiracy.
episodes.title: The Whistleblower

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a stolen painting, Dan faints and is restricted to desk duty. Despite the handicap, Jack and Dan must capture the thief.
episodes.title: Silence of the Dan

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Liz leave town for a romantic weekend away at a bed and breakfast, but the fire is short-lived when Jack becomes suspicious of the owner.
episodes.title: The Getaway

episodes.synopsis: While following up on a stolen truck investigation, Jack and Dan wind up uncovering a major heist involving a shipment of high-profile diamonds.
episodes.title: Supercops

episodes.synopsis: An Internal Affairs investigator hopes to put an end to Dan's irregular police methods. His investigation leads to the release of a deadly gang.
episodes.title: Cop Killer

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Dan investigate a simple dine-and-dash, but things get complicated when Jack's ex-partner, the assistant chief of the department, shows up.
episodes.title: Partners
